message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you our premium product. Given its exceptional value, I'm sure you'll find our price of $2000000 quite reasonable.
Hello Alice, thanks for your offer. While I appreciate the value of the product, $2000000 is outside my budget. I'm prepared to offer $1000000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1000000 is below the market value for this product. I'm willing to come down from my initial offer and meet you halfway at $1750000.
Alice, $1750000 is still a bit high for me.  I can go up to $1250000.  This represents a significant investment on my part, and I believe it's a fair price.

Bob, I understand your position, and I appreciate your increased offer. However, I must insist on a price that reflects the true value of the product. I'm willing to lower my price to $1625000 to meet you partway.
Alice, we're getting closer.  My final offer is $1400000.  If this doesn't work, I'll have to go with another supplier.
